text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَرۡمُونَ ٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتِ ٱلۡغَٰفِلَٰتِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ لُعِنُواْ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
translation: 23.Diggah say-moominiiniy dalwak texxeerey wohuk garcit tanil dalwa haa mari, addunyaay akeeral abbarsimeeniih, Yallih Racmatak yexxeereenih, kaadu akeeral kaxxa digaalá Ion.
